actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, and Office of Management and Budget.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the historic community of El Rito, New Mexico, through the special designation of five acres of Carson National Forest adjacent to the cemetary.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to designate five acres of land in the Carson National Forest, New Mexico, adjacent to the El Rito cemetery as special use land for use as cemetery land for members of the El Rito community.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the historic community of El Rito, New Mexico, through the special designation of five acres of Carson National Forest adjacent to the cemetary.
